page.title: 01Describing Our D-block
page.content: Our D-block lies in the heart of rich {Ayrshire Dairy farming countryside. Most of our 12 sq.km.consists of{lush {grazing farm land}with many areas of small{woodland,}made up of mainly {deciduous, with a few evergreen trees. There are{two main roads}running through our D-block:- 1.the{B7038}which runs through Shortlees and Riccarton. 2.the{A77 Trunk Road}to Glasgow,by passing Shortlees,Bellfield and the rest of Kilmarnock. Most of our D-block is{thinly {populated}supporting several Dairy farms. The remainder of our D-block is {fairly heavily populated in housing {schemes.}The people here live in Bellfield,Shortlees and Riccarton.
